step2.ptxt: When any one of the following conditions is satisfied, the illuminated entry system turns on the key cylinder light assembly, map light assembly*, No. 1 room light assembly* and No. 2 room light assembly*:

step3.ptxt: Any door is unlocked using the transmitter.*

step2.ptxt: When any one of the following conditions is satisfied, the key cylinder light assembly is turned off:*

step3.ptxt: The ignition switch is turned to ON.
The light has remained on for approximately 7.5 seconds after all doors have been properly closed.

step2.ptxt: When any one of the following conditions is satisfied, the key cylinder light assembly, map light assembly, No. 1 room light assembly and No. 2 room light assembly will fade out (within approximately 1 second):*

step3.ptxt: All doors are closed and locked using the transmitter.
All doors are closed and the ignition switch is turned to ON.
The lights have remained on for approximately 15 seconds after all doors have been properly closed.
